Articles.Content:
Hello!

I\'m Mini and after watching a few Let\'s Plays of this game on You Tube i thought i would give it a go and oh what fun it is!

I am only using the stock game at the moment and have completed many full orbits and succesful ocean landings.

I was wondering if there is much of a community as far as Teamspeak goes where people can sit and talk whilst playing the game so they can share stories, knowledge and tips on the game?

See you amongst the stars!

Mini

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Sorry Im Late.

Welcome to the KSP Forums.

To answer your questions, not that I know of. But if you do find one, Could you please PM me.
